Host server2

  User duchess
    IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id-server2
    IdentitiesOnly yes

```
if [ -n "$SSH_CLIENT" ]; then text=" ssh"
fi
export PS1='\[\e[0;36m\]\u@\h:\w${text}$\[\e[0m\] '
```
